entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Summerland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:35 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerland 8:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 38 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
